name: ambre-gastronomy-project-01
description: Ambre — front-end project (HTML, CSS, Vanilla JS). Live demo: https://gastronomy-project-01.netlify.app/
author: Kamil Król | KP_Code_

scripts.build:css: postcss css/style.css -o css/style.min.css --no-map && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const css=fs.readFileSync('css/style.min.css','utf8');if(/@import/i.test(css)){console.error('Found @import in css/style.min.css');process.exit(1);}console.log('CSS bundle OK');"
scripts.build:js: esbuild js/script.js --bundle --minify --target=es2018 --outfile=js/script.min.js --log-level=warning && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const js=fs.readFileSync('js/script.min.js','utf8');if(/\bimport\s|from\s+\"\.\/modules\//.test(js)){console.error('Found import syntax in js/script.min.js');process.exit(1);}console.log('JS bundle OK');"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.qa: npm run qa:links && npm run qa:html && npm run qa:js && npm run qa:css
scripts.qa:html: html-validate index.html menu.html galeria.html cookies.html polityka-prywatnosci.html regulamin.html 404.html offline.html
